meanings.sent1: After running, I always perspire a lot.
meanings.sent2: It is normal to perspire during a workout.
meanings.sent3: I tend to perspire like a waterfall when I exercise.
meanings.sent4: The intense heat made me perspire as if I were in a sauna.
meanings.sent5: The nervousness caused me to perspire profusely before the presentation.

meanings.definition: To exude moisture through the pores of the skin
meanings.sent1: In hot weather, my skin tends to perspire more.
meanings.sent2: Some people perspire excessively when they are anxious.
meanings.sent3: The humid room made the walls perspire with moisture.
meanings.sent4: The plants seemed to perspire in the intense sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's forehead started to perspire as he pushed himself harder.
